description.title: Description
description.description: A plain text description of the biosample. Do not include experiment details, constructs or treatments.

constructs.title: DNA constructs
constructs.description: Expression or targeting vectors stably or transiently transfected (not RNAi).

items.title: DNA Constructs
items.description: An expression or targeting vector stably or transiently transfected (not RNAi).

rnais.title: RNAi vectors
rnais.description: RNAi vectors stably or transiently transfected.

items.title: RNAi Vector
items.description: RNAi vector stably or transiently transfected.

protocol_documents.title: Protocol documents
protocol_documents.description: Documents that describe the biosample preparation.

items.title: Protocol document
items.description: A document that describes the biosample preparation.

donor.title: Donor
donor.comment: For human biosamples, see human_donor.json for available identifiers. For mouse biosamples, see mouse_donor.json for available identifiers.

passage_number.title: Passage number
passage_number.description: In calculating passage number, include passages from the source.

derived_from.title: Derived from
derived_from.description: The biosamples from which the sample derives from via constructs or treatments.

items.description: A biosample that the sample derives from via a construct or treatment.

pooled_from.title: Pooled from
pooled_from.description: The biosamples from which aliquots were pooled to form the biosample.

items.description: A biosample from which an aliquot was taken to form the biosample.

part_of.title: Separated from
part_of.description: The biosamples from which a discrete component were taken. That component is this biosample.

items.description: A biosample from which a discrete component was taken. That component is this biosample.

note.title: Note
note.description: Additional information pertaining to the biosample.

subcellular_fraction.title: Subcellular fraction
subcellular_fraction.description: The cellular component that constitutes the biosample.

transfection_type.title: Transfection type
transfection_type.description: The persistence of the transfection construct.

culture_harvest_date.title: Culture harvest date
culture_harvest_date.description: For cultured samples, the date the biosample was taken.
culture_harvest_date.comment: Date can be submitted in as YYYY-MM-DD or YYYY-MM-DDTHH:MM:SS.

culture_start_date.title: Culture start date
culture_start_date.description: For cultured samples, the date the culture was started. For cell lines, the date this particular growth was started, not the date the line was established.
culture_start_date.comment: Date can be submitted in as YYYY-MM-DD or YYYY-MM-DDTHH:MM:SS.

date_obtained.title: Date obtained
date_obtained.description: For tissue samples, the date the biosample was taken.
date_obtained.comment: Date can be submitted in as YYYY-MM-DD or YYYY-MM-DDTHH:MM:SS.

starting_amount.title: Starting amount
starting_amount.description: The initial quantity of cells or tissue obtained.

url.title: URL
url.description: An external resource with additional information about the biosample.

age.title: Donor age
age.description: The age or age range of the donor organism when biological material was sampled.
